pages.text: Lamps that don't works underwater but have bigger range than underwater ones. Lamps are $(#1f22e0)Always Active$() and have $(#1f22e0)Light Penetration$() that mean lamps works fine if are underground/hidden.

Tiers:$(br)Type α: 16 Blocks Light$(br)Type β: 17 Blocks Light$(br)Type γ: 18 Blocks Light$(br)Type δ: 19 Blocks Light$(br)Type ε: 20 Blocks Light$(br)Type ζ: 24 Blocks Light$(br)Type η: 26 Blocks Light$(br)Type Ω: 30 Blocks Light
